name: VibeVerse
description: Your Mood. Your Movie. AI-powered movie and music recommendations based on your current vibe.

bot.name: VibeVerse Bot
bot.description: Get personalized movie and music recommendations based on your mood

commands.name: /mood
commands.description: Select your current mood to get recommendations
commands.help: Usage: /mood happy - Get recommendations based on your mood

commands.name: /recommend
commands.help: Usage: /recommend happy movies - Get movie recommendations for happy mood

commands.name: /watchlist
commands.help: Usage: /watchlist add Inception - Add a movie to your watchlist

commands.name: /history
commands.description: View your mood history and past recommendations
commands.help: Usage: /history week - View your mood history for the past week

commands.name: /trending
commands.description: Get trending content filtered by mood
commands.help: Usage: /trending happy - Get trending happy content

commands.name: /summary
commands.description: Get your weekly vibe-based watchlist summary
commands.help: Usage: /summary - Get your personalized weekly summary

commands.name: /filter
commands.help: Usage: /filter genre comedy - Filter recommendations by genre

functions.name: getMoodRecommendations
functions.description: Get movie and music recommendations based on mood

parameters.name: contentType
parameters.description: Type of content: movies, music, or both

functions.name: saveMoodHistory
functions.description: Save user's mood selection to history

functions.name: getTrendingByMood
functions.description: Get trending content filtered by mood

tmdb_api_key.label: TMDB API Key
tmdb_api_key.description: Your TMDB API key for movie data

youtube_api_key.label: YouTube API Key
youtube_api_key.description: Your YouTube API key for music videos
